mapper.select: select empno, ename, job, to_char(hiredate, 'yyyy"년" mm"월" dd"일"') hiredate, sal from emp
select empno, ename, job, to_char(hiredate, 'yyyy"년" mm"월" dd"일"') hiredate, sal from emp where empno = #{no}
select empno, ename, job, to_char(hiredate, 'yyyy"년" mm"월" dd"일"') hiredate, sal from emp where ename = #{name}
select empno, ename, job, to_char(hiredate, 'yyyy"년" mm"월" dd"일"') hiredate, sal from emp where empno = #{no} and job = #{job}
select empno, ename, job, to_char(hiredate, 'yyyy"년" mm"월" dd"일"') hiredate, sal from emp order by sal
select empno, ename, job, to_char(hiredate, 'yyyy"년" mm"월" dd"일"') hiredate, sal from emp order by sal desc
select empno, ename, job, to_char(hiredate, 'yyyy"년" mm"월" dd"일"') hiredate, sal from emp where ename like concat(#{key}, '%')
select * from (select emp.*, rownum rn from emp) imsi where imsi.rn >= #{startNum} and imsi.rn <= #{endNum}
